law.catch_line: Fines for operating without required certification.

text.section: Any personal services agency that provides services without receiving certification pursuant to KRS 216.712 may be fined up to five hundred dollars ($500) per day.
Any business that markets its services as a personal services agency without receiving certification pursuant to KRS 216.712 may be fined up to five hundred dollars ($500) per day.
All fines collected pursuant to this section shall be deposited in the fund established by KRS 216.716.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2009.
